summary: A love story between two hackers, Soyan and Loise. Like many other hackers, Soyan works for a company he previously hacked.
cast: Pom Klementieff|Chris Schellenger|King Orba|Alena von Stroheim|Gayla Johnson|Circus-Szalewski|Ross Butler|Ted Mattison|Mehre Ihara|Ahlam Khamis|Anthony Palermo|Ron Rogg√©
title: Hacker's Game
